price: "Vratite mi ih!", i on ih poče gladiti po nogama i vratovima.
arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ruddūhā ʿalayya faṭafiqa masḥan bil-sūqi wal-aʿnāqi
